welcome_message_body: Welcome to Somers, USA! Get ready to experience the charm of our small town and discover why it's known for its beautiful parks, historic buildings, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Somers has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all major airlines flying in and out of Westchester County Apt Airport.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dutchess County Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dutchess County Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering exclusive services and amenities.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport.
